channel.title: Interviewing on Hina Sakazaki
channel.description: Recent content in Interviewing on Hina Sakazaki

item.title: Preparing for the Second SWE Gig
item.description: I had a great 2 years and 10 months of incredible learning and fun at Zynga, but in November 2017, I decided that it was a good time to look for a new opportunity. I started my new job at Google in April 2018, and now that I’ve been at my new workplace for 6 months, I’d like to talk about my strategy and advice for switching jobs a few years out of college.
